title: enru tAn enniDam
sahitya:
enru tAn enniDam irakkam pirakkumO kunrakkuDi manrak-kumaranE undanukku


anupallavi

  kanriDam tAip-pashu koNDiDum parivu pOl undanaDi yAriDam uLLam urugumaiyE


caraNam    inruvarai aDiyEn undanadu ponnaDiyai enrumE maravAmal irundu vandEnanrO
innaluTru Ongum Ekkam enbadaip-pOkka idayam unadu karaindu udavi purindiDavE
